ingestion_configs.description: Budget items represent the appropriation bill for the state of Hawaii. The collection consists of 4 documents, HB300, HB300_HD1, HB300_SD1, and HB300_CD1,
Text items represent the text of the appropriation bill for the state of Hawaii. The collection consists of 4 documents, HB300, HB300_HD1, HB300_SD1, and HB300_CD1,
Fiscal notes represents a guideline on creating fiscal notes.
Budget worksheet items represent the budget worksheet for the state of Hawaii. These consists of explanations of budgets and how the money is allocated.
Text worksheet items represent the text of the budget worksheet for the state of Hawaii. These consists of explanations of budgets and how the money is allocated.
Hawaii statutes represent the statutes of the state of Hawaii. Use this collection to find information about the state of Hawaii and its laws.
